Description.0: Continuous Assessment: In-class engagement exercises x10.
Description.1: Group Project: Communication Exercise 3: Give short presentation on a technical topic of their choice using tools: analogies, examples, demo’s, stories, graphs, videos, visuals, interaction. Also 1500-word report.
Description.2: Group Project: Communication Exercise 1: This will involve groups choosing a topic, and then delivering a 5-minute presentation and a 1000-word report on this topic.
Description.4: Group Project: Communication Exercise 2: Each group slects both static (newspaper, magazine, book) and dynamic (video, presentation) communication and appraises each via short presentation & a 1500-word report.
